mapper.sql: id, billnumber, goodid, geelybillnumber, geelycount, batch, count, boxcount,startname, startnumber, endname, endnumber, routetype, carnumber, driver, phone, carriername, cartypename, highlength, highheight, lowlength, lowheight, carwidth, money, remarks, username, createtime
mapper.select:
select t.billnumber, t.goodid, t.geelybillnumber, t.geelycount, t.batch, t.count, t.boxcount,t.startname, t.startnumber,t.endname, t.endnumber, t.routetype, t.carnumber, t.driver, t.phone, t.carriername, t.cartypename,t.highlength, t.highheight, t.lowlength, t.lowheight, t.carwidth, t.money, t.remarks, t.username, t.createtime from transportbillcache t,good g,supplier s where t.goodid=g.id and g.supplierid=s.id
and g.goodcode like '%${goodcode}%'
and g.goodname like '%${goodname}%'
and s.suppliercode like '%${suppliercode}%'
and s.suppliername like '%${suppliername}%'
and t.billnumber like '%${billnumber}%'
and t.geelybillnumber like '%${geelybillnumber}%'
and t.carnumber =#{carnumber}
and to_days(t.createtime) >= to_days(#{dateStart})
and to_days(t.createtime) <= to_days(#{dateEnd})
and t.cartypename =#{cartypename}
and t.carriername =#{carriername}
order by t.createtime desc,t.billnumber limit #{index},30
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

insert into transportbillcache (billnumber, goodid, geelybillnumber, geelycount, batch, count,boxcount, startname, startnumber, endname, endnumber, routetype, carnumber, driver, phone, carriername, cartypename,highlength, highheight, lowlength, lowheight, carwidth, money, remarks, username, createtime) values
(#{item.billnumber},#{item.good.id},#{item.geelybillnumber},#{item.geelycount}, #{item.batch},#{item.count},#{item.boxcount},#{item.startname},#{item.startnumber},#{item.endname}, #{item.endnumber},#{item.routetype},#{item.carnumber},#{item.driver},#{item.phone}, #{item.carriername},#{item.cartypename},#{item.highlength},#{item.highheight}, #{item.lowlength},#{item.lowheight},#{item.carwidth},#{item.money}, #{item.remarks},#{item.username},#{item.createtime})
mapper.update:
update transportbillcache
billnumber = #{billnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
goodid = #{good.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
geelybillnumber = #{geelybillnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
geelycount = #{geelycount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
batch = #{batch,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
count = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER},
boxcount = #{boxcount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
startname = #{startname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
startnumber = #{startnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endname = #{endname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
endnumber = #{endnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
routetype = #{routetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carnumber = #{carnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
driver = #{driver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
carriername = #{carriername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cartypename = #{cartypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
highlength = #{highlength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
highheight = #{highheight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lowlength = #{lowlength,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lowheight = #{lowheight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
carwidth = #{carwidth,jdbcType=INTEGER},
money = #{money,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
